General.Name: First Hydrogen Corp
General.Description: First Hydrogen Corp. focuses on zero-emission vehicles, green hydrogen production and distribution, and supercritical carbon dioxide extractor systems primarily in Canada. It designs and builds hydrogen-fuel-cell-powered light commercial vehicles. The company was formerly known as Pure Extraction Corp. and changed its name to First Hydrogen Corp. in October 2021. First Hydrogen Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 755 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6Z 1X6
